name: wx-enhancer
description: Enhancers for wechat app with rx.js

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib/ --source-maps
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: tinkgu
